Articles.Content: How can I unlock the surface sample in .90? Is it a level up perk or a KSC upgrade?
Any Kerbal of any skill level can take surface samples, but you have to have the tier 2 astronaut complex (I think).
You need an upgraded astronaut complex (to EVA outside Kerbin) and an upgraded R&D (to have the ability to process samples).
Actually, you need the level 2 R&D department before you can take surface samples, though you'll also need the level 2 Astronaut Complex if you want to do so anywhere other than Kerbin.
Moving this to Gameplay Questions and Tutorials, though it looks like it's already been answered pretty thoroughly
